title: Monday Post Show (10-04-21)
itunes:title: Monday Post Show (10-04-21)
description:
Bobby starts talking about how he is having trouble getting into the doctor and the Powerball increasing since no one won. Mike D reviews Venom 2 and Bobby talks about how people who drink energy drinks are prone to addiction. Raymundo also shares stories he’s sent in before but haven’t made the air yet. Bobby plays a clip from another radio show where a listener thought he was calling our show. Bobby also shares he said last week that people hit him back and said it made him unrelatable.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
